title: Location
fullText:
A switchboard installed in or on a recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle shall be mounted at —
(a) a minimum 100 mm from the ground, floor or platform to the bottom of the switchboard enclosure; and
(b) not more than 2 m from the ground, floor or platform to the top of the switchboard enclosure.
Switchboards shall be —
(i) accessible; and
(ii) installed in well-ventilated places; and
(iii) protected against the effects of moisture to which they may be exposed; and
(iv) arranged to provide sufficient space for the initial installation and later replacement of individual items of the control and protective devices and accessibility for operation, testing, inspection, maintenance and repair.
